LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf.label: blood elf
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf.description: The Blood Elves or Sin'dorei in Thalassian ("children of the blood"), are a race composed of former high elves who renamed themselves in honor of their people who were killed during the siege of Quel'Thalas by the Scourge during the Third War.
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf.tools.3.label: head
